00024 /*
00025 ** traitRefNodeList.c
00026 **
00027 ** based on list_template.c
00028 **
00029 ** where T has T_equal (or change this) and T_unparse

00031 
00032 # include "lclintMacros.nf"
00033 # include "llbasic.h"
00034 
00035 /*@only@*/ traitRefNodeList
00036 traitRefNodeList_new ()
00037 {
00038   traitRefNodeList s = (traitRefNodeList) dmalloc (sizeof (*s));
00039 
00040   s->nelements = 0;
00041   s->nspace = traitRefNodeListBASESIZE;
00042   s->elements = (traitRefNode *)
00043     dmalloc (sizeof (*s->elements) * traitRefNodeListBASESIZE);
00044 
00045   return (s);
00046 }
00047 
00048 static void
00049 traitRefNodeList_grow (traitRefNodeList s)
00050 {
00051   int i;
00052   traitRefNode *newelements; 
00053 
00054   s->nspace += traitRefNodeListBASESIZE;
00055   newelements = (traitRefNode *) dmalloc (sizeof (*newelements)
00056                                           * (s->nelements + s->nspace));
00057 
00058   for (i = 0; i < s->nelements; i++)
00059     {
00060       newelements[i] = s->elements[i]; 
00061     }
00062 
00063   sfree (s->elements);
00064   s->elements = newelements;
00065 }
00066 
00067 traitRefNodeList
00068 traitRefNodeList_add (traitRefNodeList s, /*@only@*/ traitRefNode el)
00069 {
00070   if (s->nspace <= 0)
00071     traitRefNodeList_grow (s);
00072 
00073   s->nspace--;
00074   s->elements[s->nelements] = el;
00075   s->nelements++;
00076 
00077   return s;
00078 }
00079 
00080 /*@only@*/ cstring
00081 traitRefNodeList_unparse (traitRefNodeList s)
00082 {
00083   cstring st = cstring_undefined;
00084 
00085   traitRefNodeList_elements (s, current)
00086   {
00087     st = message ("%quses (%q)", st, printLeaves2 (current->traitid));
00088 
00089     if (current->rename != 0)
00090       {
00091         st = message ("%q (%q)", st, renamingNode_unparse (current->rename));
00092       }
00093 
00094     st = message ("%q\n", st);
00095   } end_traitRefNodeList_elements;
00096 
00097   return (st);
00098 }
00099 
00100 void
00101 traitRefNodeList_free (traitRefNodeList s)
00102 {
00103   int i;
00104   for (i = 0; i < s->nelements; i++)
00105     {
00106       traitRefNode_free (s->elements[i]); 
00107     }
00108 
00109   sfree (s->elements); 
00110   sfree (s);
00111 }
